dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Good morning, Sam! It's quite cold outside today.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Morning, Alex! Yes, the weather is definitely cold. It's winter, after all.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I want to go for a walk. Will you come with me?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Sure! Just let me get ready. What should I wear?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: You should wear your blue jeans and a hat. Oh, and don't forget your coffee. We can drink it while we walk.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Good idea. I'll open the window first to check how cold it is.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: The water is running in the bathroom. Did you leave it on?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Oh! I'll go and turn it off. Can you wait for me at the door?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: This path is beautiful with all the snow. Look at the trees!

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Yes, it's lovely. The sunset yesterday was beautiful too. I watched it from our window.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Wait, I think we're going the wrong way. This doesn't look right.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Hmm, you may be right. I don't recognize this part of the park.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I think we're lost. This is a little difficult.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Don't worry. I can ask for directions. There's a person over there.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Good idea. Half of the time, I get lost in this park.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Let me go and talk to him. Wait here, please.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: OK, I have the information we need. The man was very helpful.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Great! What did he say?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: He said we should go straight and then turn right at the large store.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Ah, I see it now! That store figures prominently in my memory. We're close to home.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Yes! And look, there's our friend Tom over there.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Shall we open it? The coffee, I mean. I'm cold and would like a drink.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Certainly! Let's drink it together and then go home.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: This was a nice morning walk, even with our little mistake. Tomorrow, let's try a different path.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: I'd like that. We can explore more of the park together.
